source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SEQ_00<tab>Cerigg worries for Taynor, who has been acting strangely of late.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SEQ_00<tab>Cerigg semble se faire du souci pour Taynor.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SEQ_01<tab>Though Taynor remains singularly focused on the confrontation ahead, Cerigg is concerned that the boy may be suppressing his true emotions. The bounty hunter asks you to have a talk with your young companion─one mage to another─that you might help him work through any lingering anxiety or fears.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SEQ_01<tab>Selon Cerigg, Taynor n'est pas dans son assiette. Retrouvez-le à Mord Souq et demandez-lui ce qui ne va pas.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SEQ_02<tab>You speak to Taynor, who confesses that he harbors a deep-seated fear that he might falter in battle, condemning you and Cerigg to a grim fate in the void. Through your heartening words, the child is able to realize that the burden is not his to shoulder alone, and thus regain a measure of confidence. Together, you decide to return to Cerigg and inform the bounty hunter that all are now ready to face the final confrontation.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SEQ_02<tab>Malgré son regain de confiance en lui, Taynor vous a avoué craindre le pire pour l'af<var 16 /var>fron<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment contre Phrenosis. Après tout, votre vie et celle de Cerigg dépendent de lui... Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, vous avez su trouver les mots justes pour lui remonter le moral. Retournez auprès de Cerigg.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SEQ_03<tab>You and Taynor reconvene with Cerigg, and all present reaffirm that the time has come to take on Phronesis once and for all. From here, you and your companions decide to make for the Central Hills of Amber in Amh Araeng, where Taynor will work his magicks to summon your foe to battle.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SEQ_03<tab>Vous êtes désormais tous les trois prêts à en découdre avec Phronesis. Allez aux collines d'Ambre du Centre, en Amh Araeng, et parlez à Taynor.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SEQ_04<tab>Though the battle was a harrowing one, you and your companions have emerged victorious─Phronesis will terrorize the people of Amh Araeng no more. Bear witness to the sin eater's final moments, and pray that the soul of Taynor's old friend will find peace.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SEQ_04<tab>Taynor a ouvert une faille vers l'interstice dimensionnel et a ainsi attiré Phronesis dans les mailles de votre filet. Donnez une bonne leçon à l'apôtre et libérez l'âme du pauvre Nyelbert<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SEQ_05<tab>In the sin eater's last moments, Nyelbert's memories manifest themselves, revealing how the archmage continued to search for a way to bring his friend back from beyond the rift until the very end of his days. Taynor looks on in tears as his old friend laments his failure, and offers words of comfort in the vain hope of freeing him from his torment. Whether the result of the words reaching him or by sheer coincidence, the sin eater's form dissipates into innumerable motes of light, and is no more. Speak to Taynor, and lend your support to the boy in what is undoubtedly an emotionally trying moment for him.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SEQ_05<tab>Vous avez vaincu Phronesis. Avant de s'endormir pour l'éternité, l'esprit de Nyelbert a communiqué quelques mots d'adieu à Taynor, ce qui n'a pas manqué d'émouvoir le petit garçon. Parlez-lui.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SEQ_06<tab>Though it is unlikely that Taynor's heartfelt words truly reached his old friend, the experience nevertheless has allowed the boy to come to terms with his past, and with his own heretofore-conflicted feelings. Weary from battle, you and your two companions decide to return to Mord Souq to recuperate and reflect upon the experience you've shared.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SEQ_06<tab>Vous avez fêté votre victoire avec Cerigg et Taynor. Retournez à Mord Souq et parlez à Cerigg.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SEQ_07<tab>Back at Mord Souq, Taynor expresses his gratitude for all that you and Cerigg have done for him, explaining that your adventures together have given him the confidence he needs to strike out on his own. Cerigg responds by inviting the boy to become his partner, and continue their adventure together, an offer which Taynor eagerly accepts. Your two companions invite you to join them at the Crystarium for a final farewell before you go your separate ways.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SEQ_07<tab>Cerigg a proposé à Taynor de monter une équipe de chasseurs de primes, ce que le garçon a accepté sans sourciller. Allez aux Marches nébuleuses à Cristarium et parlez à Cerigg.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SEQ_08<tab>Back at the Crystarium, Cerigg and Taynor once more express their gratitude for all you have done for them. Cerigg vows to take good care of the boy, to show him the world and help him grow into his new life as a bounty hunter. Accepting your share of the reward for felling Phronesis, you wish your friends the best and strike off on your own, hoping deep down that your paths will cross again someday.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SEQ_08<tab>Vous avez reçu votre récompense tant méritée, même si elle n'était pas à la hauteur de la moitié de la somme promise pour la tête de Phronesis. Et si vos deux amis vous contactent pour faire équipe une nouvelle fois, n'hésitez pas à les aider, la prime risque d'être fort juteuse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SYSTEM_900_000<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “Warrior of Darkness.”
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_SYSTEM_900_000<tab>Il est nécessaire de terminer la quête de l'épopée “Le guerrier de la légende” pour progresser dans celle-ci.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_000<tab>Cerigg said that our fate in the battle against Ny─er, Phronesis depends on me. I will not...I <var 1A 02 /var>cannot<var 1A 01 /var> fail.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_000<tab>Sans moi, vous ne parviendrez pas à vaincre Phronesis... Ça me rend ter<var 16 /var>ri<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment anxieux, mais je vous promets de faire de mon mieux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_020<tab>Well, look who's back─and looking more imposing than ever, I might add. You'll be pleased to know that Taynor's command of his magicks has advanced by leaps and bounds since you left. Says he's finally convinced he can hold his own against Phronesis.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_020<tab>Prêt<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> pour le baroud d'honneur, camarade<var 1D /var>? Le moment ne pourrait pas être mieux choisi car Taynor est au sommet de son art. Il risque de sceller cette maudite faille tellement vite qu'elle n'aura peut-être même pas le temps de s'ouvrir, la bougresse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_021<tab>Truth be told, I worry about the boy. As devoted as he is to his training, I can't help but notice a sad, uneasy look in his eyes from time to time. He insists it's nothing, of course, but I remain unconvinced.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_021<tab>Mais malgré ses progrès fulgurants, le petit bonhomme n'a pas l'air dans son assiette der<var 16 /var>niè<var 16 /var>re<var 16 /var>ment... Je me demande bien ce qui le turlupine autant.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_022<tab>As a fellow mage, perhaps you could succeed in reaching out to him where I failed. He should be around here somewhere. Go and find him, and see if you can't offer him a few words of support, won't you?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_022<tab>Ça te dérangerait d'aller en discuter avec lui<var 1D /var>? Il te tient en très haute estime, tu sais, et je suis persuadé que tu sauras lui remonter le moral avec tes conseils toujours pertinents. Tu devrais le trouver quelque part à Mord Souq.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_030<tab>Taynor probably reckons that a muscle-headed bounty hunter like me couldn't understand the worries of mages─and hells, he's probably right. Would you be so kind as to go and talk to the boy for me? He should be around here somewhere...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_030<tab>Taynor te tient en très haute estime, tu sais, et je suis persuadé que tu sauras lui remonter le moral avec tes conseils toujours pertinents. Tu devrais le trouver quelque part à Mord Souq.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_050<tab>Oh, hello there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Is there something I can do for you?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_050<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Bonsoir)) ((Bonjour)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Bonjour)) ((Bonsoir)) /var>)) /var>...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_051<tab>Cerigg was worried about me, you say? That is...kind of him. I assure you, I'm completely fine...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_051<tab>Vous venez de la part de Cerigg, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? Oui, je sais bien qu'il s'inquiète pour moi...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_052<tab>I owe so much to the both of you. You brought me back from beyond the rift, took me under your wing...trained me and comforted me to the point that my memories and my magic have both returned. I am finally ready to face my old friend in battle...and it is all because of you.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_052<tab>Disons que... grâce à vos conseils et à l'en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment de Cerigg, je pense sincèrement avoir suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment confiance en moi pour sceller le trou noir de Phronesis et réussir cette mission.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_053<tab>And yet, there is a fear growing inside me...a fear that threatens to consume me.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_053<tab>Mais... maintenant que je suis sur le point de risquer ma vie et celle d'autres personnes, je réalise à quel point les purgateurs sont des créatures épouvantables.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_054<tab>In my studies, I have learned much about the sin eaters. I learned how those who fall to the most powerful sin eaters─like Phronesis─become sin eaters themselves, doomed to live out their days as mindless, unholy abominations.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_054<tab>En plus de ça, Phronesis fait partie des plus effrayants d'entre eux. C'est un apôtre capable de transformer de pauvres innocents en purgateurs...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_055<tab>If I were to lose my focus in battle, and you or Cerigg suffered the same fate as Nyelbert...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_055<tab>Si jamais je fais un faux pas durant le combat, Cerigg et vous risquez d'y perdre votre humanité, et je ne pourrais jamais me le pardonner...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_056<tab>The only three friends I have known in this world... If I lost you all, how could I ever live with myself again!? This thought, it shakes me to my very core.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_056<tab>Vous comptez vraiment beaucoup pour moi, tous les deux... Je ne veux pas vous perdre...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_Q1_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_A1_000_000<tab>If you falter, we will be there for you.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_A1_000_000<tab>Tout va bien se passer, car l'union fait la force<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_A2_000_000<tab>Worry not for us. Think only of Nyelbert.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_A2_000_000<tab>Concentre-toi sur ta tâche et ne t'en fais pas pour nous.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_060<tab>...You are right. I mustn't forget that I have two strong friends by my side to help me shoulder the burden.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_060<tab>Oui, je sais bien que je ne serai pas seul durant cette difficile épreuve. À nous trois, on va n'en faire qu'une bouchée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_065<tab>So you are saying that I should free my mind of distractions, and focus on the task at hand?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_065<tab>Vous avez raison, ce genre de pensées négatives ne peut que me nuire...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_066<tab>Perhaps you're right. Worrying endlessly about things beyond my control will only serve to break my focus.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_066<tab>Si je m'inquiète trop, je risque encore de viser à côté, et ensuite je n'aurai plus que mes yeux pour pleurer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_071<tab>Thank you, friend. The task is a daunting one, but I will trust in myself─and in the strong and gentle friends who stand by my side.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_071<tab>Merci, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Je suis vraiment content de participer à cette bataille avec Cerigg et vous. Ensemble, nous allons libérer l'âme de Nyelbert du purgatoire dans lequel elle est enfermée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_072<tab>Nothing would make me happier than to help Nyelbert find peace, but that is not the only reason I fight this battle. I must repay you and Cerigg for all you have given me.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_072<tab>J'espère qu'après autant de douleur, il pourra enfin reposer en paix... Et aussi que je pourrai rester avec vous deux pour continuer mon en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment et devenir un des plus grands mages de tous les temps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_073<tab>Not only did the two of you bring me back to this world, you have instilled me with a newfound sense of purpose. And yet, when the battle is done, you will leave this place.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_073<tab>Mais je sais bien que vous ne resterez pas en Amh Araeng, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Vous allez repartir à l'aventure comme d'habitude, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_074<tab>You will embark on new adventures, with new companions. Worry not─I will not hold you back, or stand in your way.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_074<tab>J'aimerais beaucoup vous accompagner, mais je ne ferais que vous gêner...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_075<tab>That is another reason I must fight this battle. I must prove to you─to all three of my friends─that I am strong enough to get by on my own.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_075<tab>Je comprends, et vous pouvez compter sur moi pour donner tout ce que j'ai contre Phronesis. Je délivrerai Nyelbert, et je lui prouverai que sa quête pour me libérer n'aura pas été vaine. À partir de maintenant, je suis capable de me débrouiller tout seul<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_076<tab>Be strong, Taynor─you can do this! Er, sorry...perhaps I got a little carried away there. In any event, we should go tell Cerigg that I'm ready.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_076<tab>Hé hé, j'ai retrouvé une patate d'enfer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_090<tab>I asked Cerigg what he intends to do after the battle is over, but he just scowled and told me to focus on the task at hand.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_090<tab>(Cerigg m'a demandé de me focaliser sur le combat contre Phronesis et de ne pas penser à ce qu'il adviendra ensuite. Il était un peu sec, alors ça m'a mis mal à l'aise...)

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_091<tab>Do you think he's feeling sad about us splitting up, too? Er, d-don't tell him I said this, of course!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_091<tab>(Au fond, je pense qu'il s'inquiète vraiment pour moi, mais il ne veut pas l'avouer. Faites comme si je n'avais rien dit, d'accord<var 1D /var>?)

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_100<tab>You're finally back, I see. I was starting to get worried. I trust this means you're ready to do battle with Phronesis?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_100<tab>Content de vous revoir, vous deux. La mine réjouie de Taynor signifie que vous êtes prêts à en découdre, je suppose<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_101<tab>I am! Let us put an end to this nightmare, and set Nyelbert and the people of this land free.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_101<tab>Exactement<var 1D /var>! Nous allons envoyer le grand pécheur à la pêche aux moules<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_102<tab>That's the spirit! All right─the plan is to lure Phronesis to us by the same method as last time. We will venture to the Central Hills of Amber, a safe distance away from the city, and Taynor will summon forth a hollow. It should only be a matter of time before our quarry arrives.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_102<tab>Dis donc gamin, t'es en forme comme jamais, ma parole<var 1D /var>! Dans ce cas, il est grand temps de mettre une raclée à Phronesis aux collines d'Ambre du Centre et d'empocher le magot<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_103<tab>I believe our chances are best if we can lure Phronesis to a wide-open space, where we will have complete freedom to maneuver. The Hills of Amber should suffice. If you are ready, let us away at once.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_103<tab>Pour l'attirer vers nous, nous n'aurons qu'à faire comme d'habitude<var 1D /var>: en créant une faille dans l'interstice dimensionnel. Sauf que cette fois, notre coup sera prémédité, hé hé<var 1D /var>! Taynor, on compte sur toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_110<tab>I couldn't be more proud of how much Taynor has grown since we first met him. Why, he's like the son I nev─ Ahem! Enough chitchat, eh? We have a battle to fight!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_110<tab>Taynor est déjà devenu presque un adulte, mais il se laisse encore trop souvent emporter par ses sentiments. À nous de le soutenir pour qu'il ne flanche pas.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_130<tab>...I am ready. Let us begin.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_130<tab>Préparez-vous, je vais commencer à ouvrir la brèche<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_200<tab>Over there! It's him!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_200<tab>Regardez, le voilà<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_201<tab>Yes...I knew you would come. Well, I guess we won't be needing this anymore...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_201<tab>Décidément, rien de mieux qu'un bon trou noir pour l'appâter<var 1D /var>! Maintenant que c'est fait, on n'en a plus besoin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_202<tab>Give it up, Nyelbert! My spells are more than a match for your own!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_202<tab>Tu n'es pas le seul à maîtriser la création des trous noirs, saleté<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_203<tab>These are my friends, and I will not let you take them! Do you hear me, Nyelbert? Your long nightmare─and ours─shall end this day!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_203<tab>Désormais, ces deux personnes comptent plus que tout au monde pour moi, et je ne te laisserai pas leur faire de mal<var 1D /var>! À nous deux, Phronesis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_NYELBERT_000_300<tab>(-Nyelbert's Shade-)Forgive me, Taynor. Far and wide did I travel with my companions, all the while searching for a way─any way at all─to bring you back to this world. And yet, in the end, it was all in vain...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_NYELBERT_000_300<tab>(-Apparition de Nyelbert-)J'ai fait tout ce que j'ai pu pour sauver mon meilleur ami... mais j'ai échoué...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_NYELBERT_000_301<tab>(-Nyelbert's Shade-)Though I treasured the adventures I had with Ardbert and the others, my choice that fateful day forever haunted me. What if I had run off with the stone, and used its powers to rescue you as I had always intended? What adventures might <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> have shared?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_NYELBERT_000_301<tab>(-Apparition de Nyelbert-)Que serait-il arrivé si j'avais utilisé la pierre enchantée pour arriver à mes fins<var 1D /var>? La chance m'aurait-elle souri<var 1D /var>? Je l'ignore... Mais ce que j'ignorais encore davantage, c'est qu'elle ne me sourirait plus jamais...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_NYELBERT_000_302<tab>(-Nyelbert's Shade-)I sunk into the depths of despair, and felt myself a wretch for doing so. For by what right do I pity myself, when it was I who consigned you to far more cruel and tragic a fate?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_NYELBERT_000_302<tab>(-Apparition de Nyelbert-)J'ai tellement souffert, pendant tellement d'années...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_NYELBERT_000_303<tab>(-Nyelbert's Shade-)Whatever pain, whatever loss I knew is nothing compared to what you suffered─what you <var 1A 02 /var>still<var 1A 01 /var> suffer. Abandoned by your only friend, cast adrift in a cold, dark void until the end of time... Yes, no doubt you are still out there beyond the rift, cursing my name to this very day...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_NYELBERT_000_303<tab>(-Apparition de Nyelbert-)Et quand je me répétais à quel point tu me détestais pour avoir échoué à te sauver... je souffrais encore davantage...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_304<tab>That's not true, Nyelbert! I'm right here!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_304<tab>Arrête<var 1D /var>! Tu te trompes com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_NYELBERT_000_305<tab>(-Nyelbert's Shade-)And yet, even if you despise me with every fiber of your being... Even still, I would give anything to see you just one last time...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_NYELBERT_000_305<tab>(-Apparition de Nyelbert-)Mais même si tu m'as haï, ne serait-ce qu'une seule seconde... je ferai quand même tout pour te revoir...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_NYELBERT_000_306<tab>You could curse me, revile me, rain fists and magicks down upon me... It would all be worth it, just for the chance to say...I am sorry...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_NYELBERT_000_306<tab>(-Apparition de Nyelbert-)Quel que soit le nombre de larmes que j'ai versées, elles ne seront rien en comparaison de ce moment merveilleux. Mon rêve se réalisera enfin...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_307<tab>S-Stop it, Nyelbert! Please...stop saying those things...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_307<tab>Nyelbert...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_308<tab>Even after you had your mind, your heart, your very humanity ripped from you, still...still, for all these years, you kept searching for me!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_308<tab>Même transformé en apôtre, même après avoir perdu ton âme, tu n'as jamais cessé de me chercher...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_309<tab>How could I ever hate my best friend?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_309<tab>Comment pourrais-je te détester<var 1D /var>? Comment<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_310<tab>Don't you see, old friend? It was <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here who brought me back to this world, but it was <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> who guided <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> to me!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_310<tab>C'est avant tout grâce à toi que j'ai pu revenir dans ce monde... Si tu n'avais pas ouvert la faille, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> et Cerigg ne m'auraient jamais trouvé... Merci, mon ami...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_311<tab>You have suffered long enough, my friend. I can take care of myself now. You need worry about me no longer. So please...rest peacefully.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_311<tab>Repose en paix, à présent... Et ne t'inquiète pas pour moi... Je ne suis plus seul...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_350<tab>Call me crazy, but damned if the boy's words didn't actually get through to him.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_350<tab>Taynor était tellement ému... et je suis sûr que Nyelbert aussi a versé une larme, là où il se trouve.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_360<tab>It's over...at last.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_360<tab>Et voilà, tout est fini...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_361<tab>...You don't need to explain it to me. I know that the Nyelbert we saw was just a memory, a reflection from the crystal. That my friend truly passed years and years ago...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_361<tab>Les souvenirs de Nyelbert étaient enfermés dans ce cristal... mais comme son corps, ils nous ont quittés à jamais.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_362<tab>And yet, even if those words will never reach Nyelbert, simply saying them aloud gave me a measure of peace. I have no regrets today.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_362<tab>J'aurai au moins pu recueillir ses dernières paroles, et rien ne pourrait me rendre plus heureux.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_363<tab>But we should be getting back to town before any more sin eaters take notice of us, yes?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_363<tab>Nous ferions mieux de rentrer, à présent. Rester ici trop longtemps pourrait s'avérer dangereux.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_364<tab>I'll say. After that battle, I could use a rest─and I reckon <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here could as well. Shall we head back to Mord Souq?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_364<tab>Tout à fait, sans oublier que je suis com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment lessivé, et vous aussi pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment. Cap sur Mord Souq<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_380<tab>We did what we had to do. I have no regrets.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_380<tab>Je n'ai aucun regret. Repose en paix, Nyelbert...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_400<tab>Well, if it isn't the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of the hour! I'm happy to report that tales of our triumph are already spreading across town like wildfire. Word has it the merchants are so grateful that they intend to sweeten the bounty with a generous personal reward.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_400<tab>J'ai fait le tour des échoppes du quartier pour avertir les marchands que leur calvaire était terminé. Si vous aviez vu leurs mines ravies<var 1D /var>! Quant au pactole, ils sont en train de le réunir.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_401<tab>My friends...I have no words to express my gratitude.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_401<tab>Merci... Merci du fond du cœur à vous deux.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_402<tab>Thanks to you, Nyelbert has found peace, and I can finally close the book on this chapter of my past. Every day, I thank the gods for having brought us together.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_402<tab>Sans vous, je serais toujours seul dans les ténèbres, sans personne à qui parler... Et Phronesis sèmerait toujours la mort partout où il passe...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_403<tab>The feeling's mutual, lad. To be honest, I wasn't sure what to expect when you popped out of that hole, but it's been a pleasure having you at our side.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_403<tab>C'est nous qui te remercions, petit bonhomme. Si tu n'avais pas été là, on serait peut-être ensemble quand même... mais dans l'interstice dimensionnel<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_404<tab>So, tell me. Now that you've made peace with your past, what do you plan to do with your future?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_404<tab>Qu'est-ce que tu comptes faire à partir de maintenant<var 1D /var>? Tu as des projets<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_405<tab>You and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> have trained me well, and I am quite confident that I can hold my own on the battlefield. Perhaps I will travel the land, and see if I might use my abilities to help those in need.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_405<tab>Grâce à vous, j'ai appris à me battre, et je compte bien mettre cet en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment à profit pour faire régner le bien et la justice autour de moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_406<tab>If I didn't know better, I'd think those were the words of someone twice your age. If that's truly your intention, then I have something of a plan.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_406<tab>Je te souhaite bien du courage, parce qu'il va t'en falloir<var 1D /var>! Mais je dois avouer qu'en fait, j'avais un plan d'avenir à te soumettre...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_407<tab>First, I'll need <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here's permission...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_407<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... J'ai comme qui dirait un service à te demander.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_408<tab>It's just a thought I had, but...what say we give the lion's share of the bounty to Taynor here? I reckon he needs it more than we do, and besides, we couldn't have won the battle without him.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_408<tab>Cette fameuse prime pour avoir éliminé Phronesis... Ça te dérangerait de nous en laisser la majeure partie<var 1D /var>? Tu comprends, Taynor aurait bien besoin d'un coup de pouce pour se lancer dans la vie...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_Q1_000_100<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_Q1_000_100<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_A1_000_100<tab>But of course!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_A1_000_100<tab>Avec le plus grand des plaisirs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_A2_000_100<tab>...You owe me one.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_A2_000_100<tab>D'accord, mais à charge de revanche<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_410<tab>I knew you'd feel the same. It's the least we can do to help the boy forge a path and a future for himself.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_410<tab>Magnifique, tu es un véritable amour<var 1D /var>! Après tout, sans Taynor, on n'aurait jamais empoché le magot, pas vrai<var 1D /var>? Mais ne crois pas que tu partiras d'ici les mains vides. Tu auras ta part, même si elle sera quelque peu en dessous des cinquante pour cent prévus initialement.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_415<tab>Ahaha! You're godsdamned right, I do! Any time you have need of a skilled marksman, you know where to find me. And don't you worry, there'll still be some coin left over for the both of us.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_415<tab>Marché conclu<var 1D /var>! Après tout, sans Taynor, on n'aurait jamais empoché le magot, pas vrai<var 1D /var>? Mais ne crois pas que tu partiras d'ici les mains vides. Tu auras ta part, même si elle sera quelque peu en dessous des cinquante pour cent prévus initialement.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_420<tab>My friends, I could never take advantage of your kindness like that...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_420<tab>Vous... Vous êtes sûrs<var 1D /var>? C'est une très grosse somme d'argent, quand même...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_421<tab>Think nothing of it. It's not easy for a boy your age to make his way in the world, and this is the least we can do. Think of it as a parting gift from your <var 08 E905 ((brother- and sister-in-arms)) ((brothers-in-arms)) /var>.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_421<tab>Ce monde dans lequel nous trimballons nos carcasses est impitoyable, gamin. Tu l'apprendras bien assez vite, et avoir suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment de deniers dans sa sacoche est une condition sine qua non pour y survivre. Prends-le comme un re<var 16 /var>mer<var 16 /var>cie<var 16 /var>ment de notre part.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_422<tab>Thank you, Cerigg. Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. As long as I live, I will never forget your generosity.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_422<tab>Euh, d'accord... Je vous promets d'en faire bon usage. Merci infiniment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_423<tab>...Finally, I've one last proposal for you, if you're keen to hear it.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_423<tab>Toutes les belles histoires ont une fin, et voilà que la nôtre se termine... Mais avant ça, j'ai une proposition à te faire, Taynor.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_424<tab>There's this bounty hunter I know. He can hold his own with a bow, but he's always thought he could take on bigger marks if he had a skilled mage at his side. If you're looking for a partner, that is.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_424<tab>Une de mes... con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ces, bel homme, grand, musclé, et chasseur de primes au demeurant, n'y connaît cependant rien du tout en magie, et cherche un mage pour faire équipe avec lui. Ça t'intéresserait<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_425<tab>Cerigg...? You could not possibly mean...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_425<tab>... Et ce mage, ce serait moi<var 1D /var>!? Vraiment<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_426<tab>'Course I'm saying it. So, what'll it be?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_426<tab>Puisque je te le dis<var 1D /var>! Alors, c'est oui ou c'est oui<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_427<tab>Yes, yes...a thousand times yes! Why, nothing would make me happier!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_427<tab>Puisque vous me laissez le choix, c'est oui<var 1D /var>! Avec grand plaisir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_428<tab>Then I suppose that settles it. Welcome aboard, lad. I've got a feeling that this is only the beginning of a rewarding relationship.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_428<tab>Voilà ce que je voulais entendre<var 1D /var>! Je compte sur ton énergie magique démesurée, camarade<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_429<tab>And on that note, I do believe my new partner and I are off to the Crystarium to find ourselves a new mark.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_429<tab>Sur ce, nous allons partir chercher du travail à Cristarium, et pas plus tard que tout de suite. Taynor doit vite apprendre une deuxième chose, c'est qu'on n'a jamais assez de sous-sous dans sa popoche<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_430<tab>If it's not too much to ask, why don't you join us there? I still owe you your share of the bounty, and I reckon it'd be a good place to say our proper farewells.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_430<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tu veux bien nous retrouver à Cristarium, s'il te plaît<var 1D /var>? Je t'y remettrai ta récompense, et on se fera nos adieux dans un décor un peu plus pittoresque que ce taudis. Ils méritent bien ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_450<tab>The path ahead will not be an easy one, but there is one thing I know: where I once feared the future, now I welcome it.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_000_450<tab>J'ai un peu peur de ne pas être à la hauteur pour me lancer à l'aventure en compagnie de Cerigg... mais qu'est-ce que je suis content, quand même<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_470<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Glad you could join us. Taynor and I just arrived a short while ago ourselves. The boy's keen on starting his new life as a bounty hunter, to say the least.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_470<tab>Voici venu le temps de nous dire au revoir, <var 08 E905 ((ma chère)) ((mon cher)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Un grand merci pour ton aide inestimable<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_471<tab>He's got no end of questions, that one. But there's only so much I can teach him─the rest he'll have to learn from experience. And so I intend to do what I can to show him the world...and keep him safe.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_471<tab>Maintenant que Taynor a accepté de devenir mon partenaire, nous allons nous mettre à la recherche des primes les plus lucratives de tout le continent. Il va nous falloir de nombreux coffres-forts pour entreposer toutes ces espèces sonnantes et trébuchantes, ha ha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_472<tab>So don't worry about us. Between my bow and his magicks, I reckon we'll be able to hold our own out there. That said, should we ever find ourselves on the trail of a particularly nasty foe, I hope you'd not be averse to lending us your strength once more.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_472<tab>Et si jamais nous tombons sur un morceau beaucoup trop gros pour deux, nous ferons appel à tes services sans hésiter. Comme ça, au bout d'un moment, tu auras compensé la perte de ta prime pour Phronesis<var 1D /var>! Tu vois que je pense à tout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_473<tab>Yes, somehow I have a feeling it won't take another hundred years for our paths to cross again. Until then, friend, stay sheltered in the shade.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_000_473<tab>En tout cas, ce fut un véritable honneur de massacrer un apôtre en ta compagnie. Que tes futures aventures soient longues et prospères, camarade<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Defeat Phronesis.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Éliminez Phronesis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_QIB_PHRONESIS_ETHER_GAUGE_NAME<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_QIB_PHRONESIS_ETHER_GAUGE_NAME<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_500<tab>Leave the hollow to me, and concentrate your attacks on our foe!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_500<tab>Je m'occupe de refermer les trous noirs<var 1D /var>! Pendant ce temps, ne laissez pas le temps à Phronesis de respirer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_510<tab>You heard the boy! It's time to show this bastard what we've got!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_510<tab>Entendu, gamin<var 1D /var>! Chacun son boulot, et les purgateurs iront errer dans l'autre monde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_520<tab>Be wary, friends! He means to summon a hollow!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_520<tab>Des failles vont bientôt apparaître<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_530<tab>Keep a wide berth, friend, lest you get drawn into the void!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_530<tab>Reste à l'écart des trous noirs, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! C'est ex<var 16 /var>trê<var 16 /var>me<var 16 /var>ment dangereux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_540<tab>I've done it! The hollow is sealed!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_540<tab>Ça y est, j'ai refermé les failles<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_550<tab>Good work, boy! Now stand back and save your strength! Our foe's got more tricks up his sleeve, no doubt...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_550<tab>Bien joué, mon petit bonhomme<var 1D /var>! Repose-toi un moment, et prépare-toi pour les prochains<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_560<tab>Look out! Here comes another one!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_560<tab>Taynor<var 1D /var>! Trous noirs en vue<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_570<tab>Leave it to me, friends!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_570<tab>C'est comme si c'était fait<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_571<tab>Watch out! Hurry to Cerigg's side, or you'll bear the full brunt of his magic!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_571<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Phronesis essaie de mettre le paquet d'énergie magique sur vous<var 1D /var>! Rapprochez-vous de Cerigg pour absorber le choc ensemble<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_572<tab>The bastard's trying to take us out in one fell swoop! Move away from me, and quickly!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_572<tab>Phronesis essaie de faire d'une pierre deux coups<var 1D /var>! Écarte-toi de moi tout de suite, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_580<tab>I've...<pant> <pant>...done it... The hollow is... <pant>
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_580<tab>Ouf... J'ai réussi... à refermer les failles...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_590<tab>Damn it! Are you all right, boy!?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_590<tab>Taynor<var 1D /var>!! Est-ce que ça va<var 1D /var>? Pas de risques inutiles, tu m'entends<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_600<tab>Forgive me, friends... My strength is waning...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_600<tab>Désolé... Le dernier trou noir était vraiment résistant... J'ai besoin de récupérer un peu...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_610<tab>Looks like we're on our own until Taynor's strength returns! Stay clear of the hollows!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_610<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Taynor n'est pas au mieux de sa forme<var 1D /var>! Il va falloir gérer sans lui pendant un moment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_611<tab>Good gods, but would you look at this one! Wait, perhaps we could use the hollows to our advantage...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_611<tab>On dirait que Phronesis a plus d'un tour dans son sac<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, essaie d'utiliser les trous noirs à ton avantage<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_620<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_620<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_630<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_630<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_640<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_640<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_650<tab>Wicked white, the bastard's still going! Taynor, how do you fare?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_650<tab>Et c'est reparti pour des trous noirs<var 1D /var>! Taynor, tu te sens d'attaque<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_660<tab>...I am fine. Leave the hollows...<pant>...to me!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_660<tab>O-oui, ça devrait aller<var 1D /var>! Laissez-moi faire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_661<tab>If even the empty shell of his body can work these magicks, I shudder to think of the powers Nyelbert commanded when he still lived...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_661<tab>Ça alors... Nyelbert n'était pas le dernier des mages pour que Phronesis lance autant de sorts<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_670<tab>The sin eater's strength wanes! We mustn't let up the attack!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_670<tab>Encore un effort, camarades<var 1D /var>! Il va mordre la poussière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_680<tab>Yes, my friend... Soon, you will be at peace...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_680<tab>Tu seras bientôt libre, Nyelbert...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_710<tab>I am sorry, my friends... I can summon no more strength...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_710<tab>Pardonnez-moi... Je... n'ai plus de forces... Ses trous noirs sont... trop nombreux...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_720<tab>The boy has given us all he can. It falls to us to end the fight!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_720<tab>Merde, Taynor est K.O.<var 1D /var>! Le destin de l'Amh Araeng repose sur nos épaules, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_730<tab>Again? Does he mean to cut off our escape route?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_730<tab>Encore des trous noirs<var 1D /var>!? Il veut vous emprisonner dans l'interstice<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_740<tab>The bastard's found our weakness, and damned if he doesn't know what to do with it. We must hold our ground!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_740<tab>Il y a une lacune dans sa technique<var 1D /var>! Servons-nous-en pour nous échapper<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_750<tab>There's so many of them...! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Cerigg...be safe!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_750<tab>Le nombre de trous noirs est tout bonnement incroyable... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Cerigg, faites très attention<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_690<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_TAYNOR_BATTLETALK_000_690<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_700<tab>Damn it! It can't be over... Not like...this...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA451_03628_CERIGG_BATTLETALK_000_700<tab>Désolé... Je n'en... peux plus...
